mapper.select:
SELECT bu.nickname AS bu_nickname, bu.id AS bu_id,
bs.id AS bs_id, bs.shop_name AS bs_shop_name, bs.shop_type AS bs_shop_type,
bp.id AS bp_id, bp.platform_name AS bp_platform_name,
bt.id AS bt_id, bt.product_style AS bt_product_style, bt.product_keywords AS bt_product_keywords, bt.template_tags AS bt_template_tags, bt.product_original_price AS bt_product_original_price, bt.create_time AS bt_create_time, bt.state AS bt_state
FROM brush_user t1 INNER JOIN brush_business_template bt on bt.id = t1.id INNER JOIN brush_business_user bu on bu.user_id = t1.id INNER JOIN brush_shop bs on bs.user_id = t1.id INNER JOIN brush_platforms bp on bp.id = bs.platform_id
and bt.product_keywords LIKE '%${condition.keywords}%'
and (bt.create_time > #{condition.stime} and bt.create_time < #{condition.etime})
or bt.state = #{s}
order by ${condition.sortName}
DESC
ASC
